Package game.ecs.component

Class ColliderComponent

java.lang.Object
game.ecs.component.AbstractComponent
game.ecs.component.ColliderComponent
public class ColliderComponent extends AbstractComponent
Classe qui represente un composant de collision. Class that represents collision bounds of the entity.
